text: dragon fruit also known at Pattaya is an
excellent source of vitamin C potassium
and iron is a superfood packed with
great health benefits and did you know
the Vietnam is the world leading
exporter of this fruit but due to the
corona virus pandemic tons of dragon
fruits were stuck at borders and
couldn't be exported for a while so it
was sold here as a very low price in
this video I will give you some ideas
what to make with this grapefruit so if
you can fight it next time at your local
supermarket give it a try
let's begin first recipe is red dragon
fruit and yogurt sorbet peel and cut the
fruit into cubes spread it out in a
ziplock bag and freeze then combine in a
food processor with some Greek yogurt
and sweetened condensed milk let until
smooth
pour into a container and keep in the
freezer and the frakkin fruit sorbet is
ready to serve anytime
Wow look at that beautiful texture so
sweet and so smooth next let's make some
dragon fruit jelly balls cut into small
dices and feel the most makes a teaspoon
or jelly powder with a 1 cup water and a
tablespoon of sugar bring to a boil or
microwave 30 seconds on high father
jelly liquids into the mold cover with
the upper part of the mold leave to cool
and chill for a four hours in the fridge
while they look like red rubies so
precious you can add this as topping to
your favorite bubble milk tea or so with
some avocado pudding and coconut sauce
to make a perfect dessert
[Music]
because this has such a beautiful color
let's make some gumdrops with this cut
the dragon fruits into cubes and puree
and then strain to get rid of the C's
450 ml of red dragon fruit juice you
will need 25 gram of gelatin mix the
gelatin with half of the dragon fruit
juice stir well and leave for about five
minutes to bloom
combine the remaining juice with 100
gram of sugar bring to a boil is
constantly stirring to dissolve the
sugar and then add the gelatin stir
until dissolve then check off the heat
and pour into a container skim up the
form leave to cool for about 4 hours
and then cut into small cubes a
beautiful candy with natural colors and
packed with vitamin C you can use
vegetable or cookie cutters to cut into
your desired shape such a great gift to
give to your kids if you want to roll it
over some more sugar wait for one more
day until it dries out completely and
the Y is returned to wet why not making
some lollipop with dragon fruit grey and
then add some sweetened condensed milk
pour into the molds you don't have the
mold you can use a recycled plastic cup
then use aluminum foil to cover and stay
on a stick in the middle what a great
way to cool down and add vitamin C to
the body I hope you enjoyed today
recipes and don't forget to click like
and subscribe I will see you there next
time bye
